objects.text:
40mm Dynamic Drivers
Lightweight Folding Design
Over-Ear Comfort Fit
Built-in Microphone

product_details.name: RORSOU R10 Over-Ear Headphones with Microphone, Lightweight Folding Stereo Bass Headset with 1.5M No-Tangle Cord, Portable Wired Headphones for Smartphone Tablet Computer MP3 / 4 (Purple)
product_details.description: Headphones Jack: 3.5 mm Jack. Model Name: R10. Connectivity Technology: Wired. Age Range (Description): Adult, Kid. Material: Nylon,Plastic. Specific Uses For Product: Sports and Exercise, Home. Recommended Uses For Product: Calling. Compatible Devices: Smartphone,Tablet,laptops,Computer,MP3,MP4. Theme: Video Game. Control Type: Media Control. Cable Feature: Retractable. Item Weight: 9.9 ounces. Water Resistance Level: Not Water Resistant. Frequency Range: 20 Hz - 20,000 Hz. Unit Count: 1 Count. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 1. Audio Driver Type: Dynamic Driver. Audio Driver Size: 40 Millimeters. Earpiece Shape: Round. Series Number: 10. Is Autographed: No. Product Dimensions: 7.09 x 3.15 x 7.87 inches. Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
This banner features a tech product advertisement layout with a vibrant and modern design. The background includes layered rectangular frames and abstract vector elements that give depth and a tech-inspired aesthetic. The main product image (ID: "product_image") of over-ear headphones appears prominently on the right, drawing immediate attention. The headline (ID: "heading") is styled in a futuristic sans-serif font in teal, complemented by a bold white subheading (ID: "subheading") beneath it. Product features (ID: "description") are listed below in clean white text. The price (ID: "price") in bold teal is placed to the lower left alongside a call-to-action button (ID: "cta_button") with rounded corners and a contrasting "SHOP NOW" text (ID: "cta"). A thin horizontal line (ID: "decorative_line") separates the description area, adding visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: #5D4590
- Violet Shadow: #463169
- Teal/Aqua: #2FDAC3
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and youthful color palette dominated by rich purple and bright teal shades, creating a visually appealing and modern look. The primary color is a deep purple (#6C3FAF), used extensively on the ear cups, headband exterior, and joint sections, imparting a premium and bold feel. Accentuating this is a vivid teal (#2EE5BE), which outlines the ear cups and lines the inner headband. The teal adds contrast and liveliness, making the design pop without overwhelming. These two colors blend smoothly while offering high contrast, making them ideal for a banner that grabs attention yet feels cohesive.
